title: What is this font? It has a peculiar E
author: Lance0120

comments.content: Whatever the original typeface, it has been severely bastardized…
Don't hold back Nick, it looks like it's been tortured!

I think it started out as Felix Titling, and then went downhill quickly. It's been stretched and skewed almost to unrecognizability. Someone needs to stay far, far away from trying to do graphic design.
